description: Canonical opponent scouting pack for Leafs Dynasty AI. Stores system/tendency ratings, goalie profiles, and physicality for each NHL opponent, aligned with OpponentArchetypeMap_v1.0.

systems_profile.forecheck_pressure: 1-5 rating of how aggressive the forecheck is.
systems_profile.neutral_zone_trap_strength: 1-5 rating of trap strength (1 = no trap, 5 = heavy 1-3-1/1-1-3).
systems_profile.defensive_collapse: 1-5 rating of how hard they collapse to slot/net-front.

special_teams_profile.pk_aggression: 1-5 rating of how aggressive PK is.
special_teams_profile.pk_box_collapse: 1-5 rating of how hard PK collapses to slot.

goalie_profile.low_shot_rebound_threat: 1-5 rating of low shots creating rebounds.

physicality_profile.overall_physicality: 1-5 rating of hit volume and intensity.
physicality_profile.dirty_area_commitment: 1-5 rating of willingness to go to hard areas.

event_profile.event_rate: 1-5 rating of game pace (1 = very low-event, 5 = track meet).
event_profile.penalty_rate: 1-5 rating of how often they draw/take penalties.
event_profile.comeback_push_level: 1-5 rating of late-game aggression when trailing.
event_profile.turtle_level_with_lead: 1-5 rating of how much they sit back when leading.

tendency_flags.curl_shooter_present: true if they have a known curl-and-shoot threat.
tendency_flags.net_front_tip_specialist: true if they rely on tips/screens a lot.
tendency_flags.east_west_pp_playmaker: true if they have a strong east–west PP playmaker (Ovi-side threat, etc.).

integration.archetype_hint: Suggested archetype_id that should match or influence OpponentArchetypeMap_v1.0.
integration.confidence_score: 0.0–1.0 float representing how confident the scout data is.
integration.last_updated: ISO date string of last manual update.

notes: Classic trap/low-event structure with hard slot collapse.
Sorokin/Varlamov can steal games but generally position-first.
Winning formula is patience, point shots through traffic, and rebounds.
Dangerous on PP with shooting-first mentality and curl shooters.
Can create chaos on forecheck; punish over-aggression with controlled exits.
Low-shot rebounds are a major risk factor if defensive box-out fails.
Umbrella PP with Ovi-side threat; seam denial is priority one.
Goalie leaves dangerous low rebounds; farm 2nd-chance chances.
Heavy but not insanely fast; cycle and physicality are their identity.
